thumb.title: Garrett Specialties - Promotional Products
thumb.description: Garrett Specialties promptly delivers strategic, creative solutions for each of our client's promotional merchandise needs. Since 1991, Garrett Specialties has been offering over 1,000,000 promotional items imprinted with your company logo or message. Our sales representatives are highly trained and experienced profess the promotional products industry. Our sales support, accounting, shipping, and art staff members provide a solid foundation of complete customer service. Our principals are respected in the promotional product industry and are members of the Advertising Specialties Institute, Promotional Products Association and the Awards and Recognition Association - highly regarded entities of the corporate promotional gift business.Garrett Specialties - Promotional Products10000 Lincoln Dr E #201, Marlton, NJ 080531-856 424-4818https://www.garrettspecialties.com/
